players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I find it unfortunate that we've lost a valuable member of our community so early in the game. Let's try to stay focused and work together to identify the culprit behind this heinous act."

Charlie: "Let's not jump to conclusions based on speculation. We need solid evidence to identify the culprit. I believe we should all focus on gathering information and sharing it openly with each other."
